content: The coop refurbishing is going well, thanks for asking. I've added some new nesting boxes and roosting bars, and I'm planning to add a few more ventilation windows to keep the air circulating. I've also got some fun plans to add some decoration, like a little chicken door with a sign that says "Poppy's Palace" or something like that. But first, I need to finish cleaning out the old bedding and replacing it with fresh straw and pine shavings. It's been a lot of work, but it'll be worth it to see the girls happy and healthy.
